QuestData.Title: Rite of Wisdom
QuestData.Description: To gain acceptance amongst the elders of Thunder Bluff you must next complete the Rite of Wisdom.$b$bNow that you have passed the Rite of Vision, the ancestral spirits of Red Rocks will give you the blessing of our ancestors. Only those who have drunk from the Water of Seers can gain the blessing.$b$bTravel east of Thunder Bluff, to Red Rocks and seek out the Ancestral Spirit, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Red Rocks east of Thunder Bluff and speak with the Ancestral Spirit.
QuestData.RewardText: You have shown great diligence in your yearning to pass the Rites of the Earthmother, $n.$b$bWe, the Ancestral Spirits, represent the mighty tauren who gave their lives bravely to found and protect our great city of Thunder Bluff. I hereby pass the duty of that protection over to you.
